Name: Arrow
About the game: Arrow is a local twin-stick shooter game, playable from 2 to 4 players . Gather weapons and bonus to blow up your friends in a randomly generated scrolling map ! Multiple game modes are available to show who is the best : In Last Alive , stay careful and be the last standing to win the match ! In Free for All , claim 3 kills before your opponents to win the match ! In Team Fight , choose your side and empty the enemy team lives to win the match ! A fun game to play with your friends on party !
